ditto.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: used to say that you have exactly the same opinion as someone else
ditto.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used to say that what is true of one thing is also true of another
ditto.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Where should she go? Mississippi? Too hot. Ditto Alabama.
ditto.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a mark (〃) that you write immediately under a word in a list to show that the same word is repeated
ditto.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a mark (") that you write beneath a word in a list so that you do not have to write the same word again
